OOC: He was a great RPGer. One of the best that I've seen. I'm agree 
to with a memorial and a day of silence.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: I'm very sorry to hear about this, no one in my opinion should 
have to
> feel they need to take their own life. I never met him, but by 
reading
> youre responses, he seemed very important, and nice. So i'm in for 
the day
> of silence, and would help in any way I can on the memorial (except 
for the
> fact that my computer is OLD, so I dont know how much help I could 
be)
